alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:53PM CDT until September 07 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR TERREBONNE...CENTRAL LAFOURCHE AND SOUTHEASTERN ASSUMPTION PARISHES... At 653 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Houma, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Larose, Lockport, Schriever, Gray, Chauvin, Dulac, Montegut, Bayou Cane, Cocodrie, Tambour Bay Buoy, and Lumcon Center Buoy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
